Module uk.gov.gchq.eventlogging
Package event.logging

Interface EventLoggerBuilder.WorkStep<T_EVENT_ACTION extends EventAction>

  • All Known Implementing Classes:
    EventLoggerBuilderImpl, MockEventLoggerBuilder
    Enclosing interface:
    EventLoggerBuilder
    public static interface EventLoggerBuilder.WorkStep<T_EVENT_ACTION extends EventAction>

    • Method Summary

      All Methods Instance Methods Abstract Methods 
      Modifier and Type Method Description
      EventLoggerBuilder.ActionSubBuilder<T_EVENT_ACTION> withComplexLoggedAction​(java.util.function.Function<T_EVENT_ACTION,​ComplexLoggedOutcome<java.lang.Void,​T_EVENT_ACTION>> loggedAction)  
      <T_RESULT> EventLoggerBuilder.ResultSubBuilder<T_EVENT_ACTION,​T_RESULT> withComplexLoggedResult​(java.util.function.Function<T_EVENT_ACTION,​ComplexLoggedOutcome<T_RESULT,​T_EVENT_ACTION>> loggedWork)

    • Method Detail

      • withComplexLoggedResult

        <T_RESULT> EventLoggerBuilder.ResultSubBuilder<T_EVENT_ACTION,​T_RESULT> withComplexLoggedResult​(java.util.function.Function<T_EVENT_ACTION,​ComplexLoggedOutcome<T_RESULT,​T_EVENT_ACTION>> loggedWork)
        Type Parameters:
        T_RESULT - The type of the result of the work.
        Parameters:
        loggedWork - A lambda to perform the work that is being logged and to return the EventAction , the result of the work and the outcome. This allows a new EventAction to be returned based on the result of the work. The skeleton EventAction is passed in to allow it to be copied. The result of the work must be returned within a ComplexLoggedOutcome along with the desired EventAction.
        Returns:
        The builder instance.

      • withSimpleLoggedResult

        <T_RESULT> EventLoggerBuilder.ResultSubBuilder<T_EVENT_ACTION,​T_RESULT> withSimpleLoggedResult​(java.util.function.Supplier<T_RESULT> loggedWork)
        Type Parameters:
        T_RESULT - The type of the result of the work.
        Parameters:
        loggedWork - A simple Supplier to perform the work that is being logged and to return the result of the work. The outcome will be assumed to be a success unless an exception is thrown.
        Returns:
        The builder instance.

      • withComplexLoggedAction

        EventLoggerBuilder.ActionSubBuilder<T_EVENT_ACTION> withComplexLoggedAction​(java.util.function.Function<T_EVENT_ACTION,​ComplexLoggedOutcome<java.lang.Void,​T_EVENT_ACTION>> loggedAction)
        Parameters:
        loggedAction - A lambda to perform the work that is being logged and to return the outcome. This allows a new EventAction to be returned based on the result of the work. The skeleton EventAction is passed in to allow it to be copied. The result of the work must be returned within a ComplexLoggedOutcome along with the desired EventAction.
        Returns:
        The builder instance.

      • withSimpleLoggedAction

        EventLoggerBuilder.ActionSubBuilder<T_EVENT_ACTION> withSimpleLoggedAction​(java.lang.Runnable loggedAction)
        Parameters:
        loggedAction - A simple Runnable to perform the work that is being logged. The outcome will be assumed to be a success unless an exception is thrown.
        Returns:
        The builder instance.
